Predict TF binding probability by TOP logistic model

Source: R/predict_occupancy.R
predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef.Rd

Predict TF binding probability using posterior mean of the regression coefficients trained from TOP logistic model.

predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef(data, mean_coef)

Arguments

data

A data frame containing motif PWM score and DNase (or ATAC) bins.

mean_coef

A numeric vector. The posterior mean of trained regression coefficients, including the intercept and coefficients for PWM score and DNase (or ATAC) bins. length(mean_coef) should be equal to 1+ncol(data).

Value

A data frame of input data and predicted TF binding probability.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
predictions <- predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef(data,
                                              mean_coef)
}
